allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Production cleanup: Remove debugging code, test scripts, and organize documentation

Major Changes:
- Removed all test/debugging scripts from ec_carwash/scripts, functions/src, and root scripts folder
- Deleted debugging utilities (delete_all_data.dart, reset_commissions.dart, csv_importer.dart)
- Removed all emojis from code and user-facing messages
- Cleaned up unnecessary verbose comments

Code Cleanup:
- Removed emojis from error_logger.dart, google_sign_in_service.dart, analytics_screen.dart, book_service_screen.dart, login_page.dart
- All debug print statements properly wrapped in kDebugMode checks
- Removed verbose NOTE comment blocks

Documentation:
- Created comprehensive README.md at project root
- Organized all documentation into docs/ folder (20+ files)
- Moved ec_carwash/README.md to docs/FLUTTER_TEMPLATE_README.md
- Moved functions/README.md to docs/CLOUD_FUNCTIONS_README.md

Configuration:
- Updated .gitignore to exclude test scripts and debug files
- Updated ec_carwash/.gitignore for better production readiness

Files Deleted:
- ec_carwash/scripts/ (3 test scripts)
- scripts/ (root debugging scripts)
- functions/src/migrate-bookings-http.ts
- functions/src/check-completed.ts
- ec_carwash/lib/utils/delete_all_data.dart
- ec_carwash/lib/utils/reset_commissions.dart
- ec_carwash/lib/utils/csv_importer.dart
- ec_carwash/lib/screens/Admin/pos_screen.dart.bak
- JANUARY-2025.xlsx

Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
